version_description:
Now you can set a password on mobile so you can synchronize your login between mobile and desktop. More to come!

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Just some regular updates for best performance. You can also now reconnect Facebook from your profile for web login only.

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Be on the lookout for some fun seasonal surprises in your Daily Stack experience!

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Your complete Lolli shopping experience is finally here! Shop at over 1,000 stores and get bitcoin back.

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Just a regular maintenance release to make sure there's enough sugar in your sweet deals. Keep stackin'!

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Now you can take a photo or screenshot of a QR code and share it to Lolli to start your transfer! Also fixed some issues with Paypal checkout on some stores.

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Quick fix to turn down the volume of the Loot Box when you have your headphones in or other music playing. Also, you can now change your display name from the Profile Settings. Happy stacking!

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Introducing Lolli for AppleWatch! Now you can check the current price of bitcoin right from your wrist, either in our companion app or as an AppleWatch Complication on your favorite watch face.

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

We've added faster refreshes of the current bitcoin price on the widget and AppleWatch app. We've also addressed a few accessibility bugs. Keep the feedback coming!

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

More accessibility updates and a new countdown timer for your Daily Stack on the shopping side of the app.

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

New, improved shopping history detail view. Also view your mobile referral rewards right inline with the rest of your shopping history. And of course, like every week, new mobile stores!

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Just a regular update to keep you smoothly shopping and stacking sats!

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Now you can manage more of your profile settings from the waiting room side of the app.

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Now everyone has access to the full shopping side of the Lolli app! We've also improved the UI for sharing with friends. More to come!

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Added some new featured stores and made some other minor updates.

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Added ability to securely change and confirm your email on mobile.

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team

Added a password length hint at login. Remember to use long, unique, unguessable passwords, folks! We recommend 1password to manage all your passwords AND get bitcoin back through Lolli.

Love,
-Matt, Alex, & The Lolli Team
